original_text: He put the poles through the rings on each side of the altar, to carry it. He used boards to make the altar so that it was empty inside.
korean_text: 제단 양쪽 고리에 그 채를 꿰어 메게 하였으며 제단은 널판으로 속이 비게 만들었더라

sentences.original_text: He put the poles through the rings
on each side of the altar
He used boards to make the altar
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 제단을 만들기 위해 널판지를 사용했다

sentences.original_text: so that it was empty inside
